actions.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.

official_title: A bill to authorize the voluntary withholding of State and District of Columbia income taxes, pursuant to agreements subject to review by the Committee on House Administration of the House of Representatives, in the case of certain legislative officers and employees.

summary.text: Authorizes the voluntary withholding of State and District of Columbia income taxes from specified legislative officers and employees pursuant to agreements subject to review by the Committee on House Administration of the House of Representatives.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the voluntary withholding of State and District of Columbia income taxes, pursuant to agreements subject to review by the Committee on House Administration of the House of Representatives, in the case of certain legislative officers and employees.
